text.div:
serviceRequestPatientSearchParameter

Parameter patient:reference

Searches for serviceRequest by a given patient Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient={uuid}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: serviceRequestPatientSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest by a given patient Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient={uuid}
